pkgmetadata.longdescription: Build Powerful Pivot Tables and Dynamically Slice Dice your Data // Build powerful pivot tables (aka Pivot Grid, Pivot Chart, Cross-Tab) and dynamically slice dice / drag 'n' drop your data. 'rpivotTable' is a wrapper of 'pivottable', a powerful open-source Pivot Table library implemented in 'JavaScript' by Nicolas Kruchten. Aligned to 'pivottable' v2.11.0.
